body.description: The celestial body (e.g. planet or moon) around which the object is orbiting.
body.title: Body

apoapsis.description: Gets the apoapsis of the orbit, in meters, from the center of mass of the body being orbited.
apoapsis.title: Apoapsis

periapsis.description: The periapsis of the orbit, in meters, from the center of mass of the body being orbited.
periapsis.title: Periapsis

apoapsis_altitude.description: The apoapsis of the orbit, in meters, above the sea level of the body being orbited.
apoapsis_altitude.title: Apoapsis Altitude

periapsis_altitude.description: The periapsis of the orbit, in meters, above the sea level of the body being orbited.
periapsis_altitude.title: Periapsis Altitude

semi_major_axis.description: The semi-major axis of the orbit, in meters.
semi_major_axis.title: Semi Major Axis

semi_minor_axis.description: The semi-minor axis of the orbit, in meters.
semi_minor_axis.title: Semi Minor Axis

radius.description: The current radius of the orbit, in meters. This is the distance between the center of mass of the object in orbit, and the center of mass of the body around which it is orbiting.
radius.title: Radius

time_to_apoapsis.description: The time until the object reaches apoapsis, in seconds.
time_to_apoapsis.title: Time To Apoapsis

time_to_periapsis.description: The time until the object reaches periapsis, in seconds.
time_to_periapsis.title: Time To Periapsis

inclination.description: The inclination of the orbit, in radians.
inclination.title: Inclination

longitude_of_ascending_node.description: The longitude of the ascending node, in radians.
longitude_of_ascending_node.title: Longitude Of Ascending Node

argument_of_periapsis.description: The argument of periapsis, in radians.
argument_of_periapsis.title: Argument Of Periapsis

epoch.description: The time since the epoch (the point at which the mean anomaly at epoch was measured, in seconds.
epoch.title: Epoch

orbital_speed.description: The current orbital speed in meters per second.
orbital_speed.title: Orbital Speed

time_to_soi_change.description: The time until the object changes sphere of influence, in seconds. Returns NaN if the object is not going to change sphere of influence.
time_to_soi_change.title: Time To Soi Change

next_orbit.description: If the object is going to change sphere of influence in the future, returns the new orbit after the change. Otherwise returns None.
